info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 7:33PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Greene and central Clay Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 733 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Knobel, or 7 miles south of Corning, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Knobel, Pollard, Greenway, McDougal, Peach Orchard, Crockett, Knob, Tipperary, Hickoria and Stonewall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for eastern Arkansas.
